!Asamah: Shilen commanded my Elkrokhian ancestors to rule over the dinosaurs, using powerful magic to control and restrain them. It was the peak of Shilen's glory, and the world owed her a debt it could never repay. But the other gods envied Shilen, and sought a chance to discredit her. At last she was seduced by her father, Gran Kain. Great with child, she was punished by her enraged mother, Einhasad. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 asama_q0126_25.htm|Next.]
